downloadTitle: SharePoint Network Topology sample diagram for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: See how containers and shape data graphics can convey infrastructure status with this Microsoft Visio 2010 sample diagram (an example of the SharePoint Network Topology Diagram Add-In).
detailsSection: See how containers and shape data graphics can convey infrastructure status with this Visio 2010 sample diagram. This sample is based on the SharePoint Network Topology Diagram Add-In for Visio 2010 (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Samples_and_Downloads/Software_Add-ins/Pages/Visio-2010-Add-in-for-SharePoint-Network-Topology-Diagram.aspx), which delivers a near real-time, online view of the status of your Microsoft SharePoint farm, its servers, and their services. The sample diagram provides an example of the Visio Services output of the add-in. Containers, hyperlinking, and shape data graphics are used to convey infrastructure status and performance nuances.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the template to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Learn about the SharePoint Network Topology Diagram Add-In for Visio 2010 (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Samples_and_Downloads/Software_Add-ins/Pages/Visio-2010-Add-in-for-SharePoint-Network-Topology-Diagram.aspx).
